title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 333.7 - Acting appointments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 333.7 - Acting appointments

State Regulations

Interim appointments, on an acting basis, of college
administrative officers and professional staff not in a negotiating unit
established pursuant to article 14 of the Civil Service Law, other than chief
administrative officer, shall be made in accordance with section
333.6
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
333.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
